@graph.name: GTN - ChIP Seq - Formation Of Super Structures On Xi
@graph.description:
## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Formation of the Super-Structures on the Inactive X](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/epigenetics/tutorials/formation_of_super-structures_on_xi/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
